creator: bob@thehardawayfamily.com
text:
installed 1.6.2 on an xp machine with jdk 1.4.2_07:

c:> ant

invalid core ant conponents vs. extensions
   core: 1.6.2
   extensions: 1.6.1

when i fallback to 1.5.2, this problem goes away??

creator: mbenson@apache.org
text:
You most likely have some conflicting things in your environment.  You might
want to check/report the settings of your ANT_* environment variables, your
PATH, and JAVA_HOME settings, for starters.
You have an old version of ant on your CLASSPATH.
creator: peterreilly@apache.org

text:
Opps, hit the commit button too early.
For example:
preilly@angel:~/cvs/net > export ANT_HOME=/home/preilly/apps/apache-ant-1.6.2
preilly@angel:~/cvs/net > export
CLASSPATH=/home/preilly/apps/apache-ant-1.6.1/lib/ant-nodeps.jar
preilly@angel:~/cvs/net > ant -version
Invalid implementation version between Ant core and Ant optional tasks.
 core    : 1.6.2
 optional: 1.6.1
preilly@angel:~/cvs/net >
creator: peterreilly@apache.org
